overview: The treasure hunt is on for a missing loot of diamonds when jewel thief Mansukh is double-crossed by his two-timing fianc√©e, Parijat, and her not-so-brotherly accomplice, Usman. But Mansukh may have a double-dealing surprise of his own. Just when police -- and Parijat -- think they've got the goods, they soon realize there is a puzzling lack of evidence. So who's got the gems? Amit Mistry, Sejal Shah and Dilip Rawal star in this comedy thriller.
title: Chaukat Rani Char Ghulam
